content:
I'm working on an IG, set up by someone else, that has a file input/properties.txt. It contains:

#guidename must match the id of the implementation guide
guidename=ig-id
copyrightyear=2019+
license=CC0-1.0
version=0.1
ballotstatus=CI Build
fhirspec=http://hl7.org/fhir/r4/
#excludexml=Yes
#excludejson=Yes
#excludettl=Yes

(where ig-id is the package id of my IG).

Is this file used by the build at all? The settings don't seem to impact my output, and I don't see any documentation for it on confluence.
it's not used and I think all of those properties are now IG properties
Well now, I didn't think of looking in the wiki, but I should have--my hunch was that it was from that era. Thanks.

Who'd a thought three years ago we'd all be sittin' here using confluence?
In them days, we'd a' been glad to have an html template.
